item.title: Thomas Massie, conservative commentators vocally oppose Trump's DEA nominee
item.description: Rep. Thomas Massie opined that the Florida sheriff Trump tapped to helm the DEA "should be disqualified for ordering the arrest a pastor who defied CO...

item.title: President Biden's pardon of son Hunter a political gift for Trump going forward
item.description: Legal and political analysts are characterizing President Biden's stunning "full and unconditional pardon" of his son Hunter as an early holiday gift ...

item.title: Karine Jean-Pierre faces press grilling after Biden pardons son Hunter
item.description: Reporters grilled White House press secretary Karine Jean-Pierre on Monday, after President Biden went back on his word and pardoned his son Hunter.

item.title: 'It's a setback': Democrats criticize Biden over Hunter pardon
item.description: Democrats are signaling they are uneasy with President Biden's decision to grant a sweeping pardon for his son.

item.title: Trump previously predicted Biden would pardon son Hunter
item.description: President-elect Trump predicted to Fox News in October that President Biden would pardon his son Hunter Biden.
